description: This Java class represents a legacy keypad event in a Zigbee device simulation, encapsulating details such as button presses, access codes, battery voltage, temperature, and event packaging logic.

classes.name: LegacyKeypadEvent
classes.description: Represents a legacy keypad event in a Zigbee device, including event details and payload serialization.

methods.name: LegacyKeypadEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a keypad event with all relevant parameters.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Generates the byte array payload for the keypad event command.
